revised_title: Electrical Experiments and Discoveries by Granvile Wheler
tldr: In this article, Granvile Wheler conducts various electrical experiments at the Royal Society, demonstrating the behavior of electrical charges and effluvia. He observes the attraction and repulsion of threads and the motion of pendulous bodies under the influence of electrical forces. Wheler's findings contribute to the understanding of electricity and its effects on various materials and objects.
